description:
Check out Weathered: Earth’s Extremes, available to watch now on the PBS App and PBS.org. https://to.pbs.org/weatheredscishow 

Hurricanes are scary and the idea is usually to move away from them as much as possible. Then there are the intrepid scientist-pilots at NOAA who fly right into them. On purpose. And they do it to save lives.

Hosted by: Hank Green (he/him) and Maiya May
----------

title: The People Who Fly Into Hurricanes (on Purpose)
